TABLE.NAME: reengagement
TABLE.COMMENT: Details about instances of the reengagement activity

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the reengagement activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: emailuser
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the user be emailed when their reengagement is complete

FIELD.NAME: usertext
FIELD.COMMENT: The text that should be sent to the user on completion of the reengagement.

FIELD.NAME: supresstarget
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of module that, if completed, should prevent an email being sent out.

TABLE.NAME: reengagement_inprogress
TABLE.COMMENT: records of reengagement activities currently in progress

FIELD.NAME: reengagement
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the reengagement which is in progress

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of user who is currently in a reengagement.

FIELD.NAME: completiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the reengagement will be complete - unix timestamp. Seconds since Midnight Jan 1, 1970 (UTC)

FIELD.NAME: emailtime
FIELD.COMMENT: time that the user started/unlocked the activity - unix timestamp. Seconds since Midnight Jan 1, 1970 (UTC)

FIELD.NAME: emailsent
FIELD.COMMENT: whether the user has been sent the email

FIELD.NAME: completed
FIELD.COMMENT: whether the user has been marked as completed
